title: HappyHandsMnl
specification: Happyhandsmnl's website showcases the company's wide array of eco-friedly products. Since the primary service of the company is personalization, the user can tryout different set of fonts that best suit his purchase. The user can also place his order/s in the website.
challenges: After the series of tutorials, this was my first project that was created from scratch. Each of the components were created from plain css and its functionalities were created from vanilla javascript. After the go-live of the project, the client requested for funcionality updates due to the users of the website would like to order right away from the website after they have browse the products and tested their font. Though the projects still needs lots of improvement, its main purposes of showcasing all the products in a neat and in fashion manner and allowing the user to test its font was achieved. The next phase of the project would be payment integration.

title: Zion Philippines
specification: Zion Philippinesâ€™s website serves as a product catalogue which includes the company profile, client reviews and the satisfied customers. The user can directly order a product and contact the company for any questions.
challenges: The challenges for the project are strict deadline due to the website must go live prior to the start of the holiday season and no prior experience with Gatsby technology. Instead, I took it as an opportunity to further improve my skills in working well under great pressure and being able to work and learn new technologies in faster phase. As a result, the client was delighted with the outcome of the website particularly to its performance, design and seamless user experience.
